column5: Came across this video on You Tube, the best of the Bill Dance Fishing Show bloopers................Enjoy!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q_BLggf-mqs&feature=related
I have seen the about 20 times    and I laugh m butt off every time I see it......
my fav is at 2:08 in the vid
I ove the blooper where his trolling motor falls off the mount...it almost seems staged...

Ya I have heard that they are all staged too..Some are funny no matter what..the rods in the ceiling fan and tailgate made me want to cry..Didnt watch the link posted so I hope were talking bout the same things here...lol
